name: Lionheart: Dark Moon
storyline: The Vaultkeeper has fallen and the Darkness is returning. It’s time for his grandchildren, Timothy and Natalia, to embark on an epic journey to collect Keys and free legendary heroes to join you in battle. Return to worlds encountered in Lionheart Tactics and explore new ones, from the mystic forests of the Tumbledowns to the blistering sands of Ibrim. Take on fearsome bosses, like Koscha the Deathless and the terrible Frog King, as you fight not only to survive but to save the very fabric of the world!
summary:
Adventure across an epic Fantasy World, collect Heroes and battle in dungeons and PvP tournaments. Over 170 heroes to summon and master! Upgrade them with pets and gear. Customize heroes with Talents!
The Dark Moon is rising. Defend your Kingdom from the eternal army of the Mirror. Wage war against the forces of evil.
Prove your might! Play as the last of the Vaultkeepers, collecting new Heroes to restore the glory of your order. Don’t be idle! The world is yours to save.
Every hero has their story. Collect them all and unleash their power!
